punctiventris Janson
as a synonym of
carbonarius Gyllenhal
; Janson did not describe the species that was cited in Rye’s article. Janson reported the species from Britain based on one specimen ; Rye reported Janson’s finding as
punctiventris Kraatz
]; notes; characters; Britain).
